Package View

Class BookingDisplay

java.lang.Object
View.BookingDisplay
public class BookingDisplay extends Object
Represents the class of BookingDisplay, which prints the UI for Booking ticket -related operations
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Harish Vasanth

    Method
    Description
    String
    askCineplex()
    This method prints the UI to get the Cineplex the user wants to watch the movie at After the cineplex is obtained, it will be returned as a String

    This method prints the UI to get the specific date the user wants to book their movie.

    This method prints the UI to get the specific movie the user wants to book.

    This method prints the UI to get the number of Seats the user wants to book at the movie.

    This method prints the UI to get the specific showtime the user wants to book.
    int
    confirmTicket(Ticket ticket)
    This method prints the UI to ask the user whether they wanna confirm the ticket, change seats or decline purchase, The payment is assumed to be done no matter what the scenario.
    static void
    failExitDialouge()
    This method prints the indicator that the tickets booked have been cancelled.
    static ArrayList<AgeGroup>
    getAges(int numSeats)
    This method collects the tally of the different age groups the purchase of tickets is for and it returns and array of AgeGroup objects corresponding to the tally.
    static void
    printExitMessage()
    This method prints a buffer so the user can read the message above before the main UI appears and asks for an input to exit.
    static void
    successExitDialouge()
    This method prints the UI indicate the tickets have been booked successfully.

  • Method Details

    • askCineplex

      public String askCineplex()
      This method prints the UI to get the Cineplex the user wants to watch the movie at After the cineplex is obtained, it will be returned as a String
      Returns:
      String

    • askSeats

      public ArrayList askSeats(int number)
      This method prints the UI to get the Seats the user wants to book at the movie. After the Seats are obtained, it will be returned as a ArrayList of the item Seat
      Parameters:
      number - , the number of seats to book
      Returns:
      ArrayList of seat

    • askTickets

      public int askTickets()
      This method prints the UI to get the number of Seats the user wants to book at the movie. After the number is obtained, it will be as a integer.
      Returns:
      int

    • askMovie

      public int askMovie(ArrayList<Movie> movies)
      This method prints the UI to get the specific movie the user wants to book. After the movie is obtained, it will returned as a integer.
      Parameters:
      movies - , the list of movies available
      Returns:
      int, the choice of movie made

    • askTiming

      public int askTiming(ArrayList<Showtime> showtimes) throws InterruptedException
      This method prints the UI to get the specific showtime the user wants to book. After the movie is obtained, it will returned as a integer. If noshowtime is available, it prints an indicative message for that.
      Parameters:
      showtimes - , the list of showtimes
      Returns:
      int, the choice of which showtime made
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • askDate

      public LocalDate askDate()
      This method prints the UI to get the specific date the user wants to book their movie. After the date is obtained, it will returned as a Date object.
      Returns:
      Date, the date obtained

    • confirmTicket

      public int confirmTicket(Ticket ticket) throws InterruptedException
      This method prints the UI to ask the user whether they wanna confirm the ticket, change seats or decline purchase, The payment is assumed to be done no matter what the scenario. Returns their option to the controller class
      Parameters:
      ticket - , the ticket to be confirmed
      Returns:
      int, the choice made when confirming the booking
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • successExitDialouge

      public static void successExitDialouge()
      This method prints the UI indicate the tickets have been booked successfully.

    • getAges

      public static ArrayList<AgeGroup> getAges(int numSeats)
      This method collects the tally of the different age groups the purchase of tickets is for and it returns and array of AgeGroup objects corresponding to the tally.
      Parameters:
      numSeats - , the number of seats to book
      Returns:
      ArrayList of age groups

    • failExitDialouge

      public static void failExitDialouge()
      This method prints the indicator that the tickets booked have been cancelled.

    • printExitMessage

      public static void printExitMessage()
      This method prints a buffer so the user can read the message above before the main UI appears and asks for an input to exit.
